optimization.data_augmentation.ssda.arithmetic_blend¶

optimization.data_augmentation.ssda.arithmetic_blend(x, x_1, alpha=1.0)¶
sum a batch along the batch dimension weighted by a uniform random vector from the n simplex

(convex hull of unit vectors)
